item.title: Options for your character

item.title: Rules
item.description: The Core Mechanic - This is a 2D6-based game. DCs: Easy: 7 | Moderate: 9 | Hard: 11 I tend to resolve most things without dice when characters are proficient at something, have a significant advantage or good plan, or when they are not under any particular pressure. Sometimes rolls can have partial success or consequences. I’ll always tell you in advance what a roll entails. Attributes - There are 5 attributes which govern characters, which typically range from -3 to +3.
